subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
John Deere Classic (Golf)
Scottish Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Spieth, who won the first two majors of the year, stayed in the United States for the John Deere Classic, which he won, while Fowler chose to play the Scottish Open.
snippet: Spieth, who won the first two majors of the year, stayed in the United States for the John Deere Classic, which he won, while Fowler chose to play the Scottish Open.
